mapper.sql: id, title, content, img, dept_id, audit_status, status, audit_res_id, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, active
mapper.select: select a.* ,b.name As name from (information AS a LEFT JOIN department AS b ON a.dept_id = b.dept_id) WHERE active = 1 order by update_time desc
select a.*,b.name as name from ( (select * from information where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and active = 1) as a left join department as b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id)
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into information (title, content, img, dept_id, audit_status, status, audit_res_id, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, active ) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{auditResId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

update information
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
active = #{active,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update information set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, audit_res_id = #{auditResId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active = #{active,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
